extendedInfo.description: LiveHive is used by sales and marketing professionals to share information with their partners and customers. LiveHive provides insight into partner and customer engagement, so you know exactly what's helping them to succeed.You create visual workspaces containing any type of sales and marketing information and then invite your partners and customers to view and share your workspaces. You can share everything with everyone, tailor a workspace to a specific partner or customer, or even create a private workspace. You're immediately notified when your partners or customers access workspaces, view information or add comments. Need to know if a new product document is useful to your partners or customers? LiveHive give you analytics to gain insight into partner and customer interactions. With LiveHive for Android, you keep track of everything on the go - workspaces, notifications, activity streams and analytics too.LiveHive for Android Mobile features:- Follow who is viewing content to engage clients and colleagues better than ever- Manage and share anything: Office and Google docs, captured webpages, images, PDFs, videos, etc.- Built-in web browser allows you to clip webpages and add them to workspaces- Follow the live Activity Stream so youâre always on the same page as your team- Keep the conversation going: Comment and discuss in your workspaces and Activity Stream- Control who can view, post, comment and more with granular permissions- Access your work on your Android smartphone, even offline!Try out LiveHive for your business with a free 30-day trial. Simply sign up via the smartphone app to begin!

reviews.title: Hard to use. Going to try web version on pc

reviews.title: Useful for capturing websites
reviews.comment: Used this app for research project. Very useful!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bad Update! UPDATE!
reviews.comment: After current update, had FC every time I tried to capture or open App. Restored to previous version and now works again. Current update no good on Archos IT101 Internet Tablet Android 2.2 Froyo. Update: Now after this latest update, App shows as no longer compatible with my tablet. Two updates ago App would constantly FC...now with this update I can\'t even install.  Guess it\'s time to uninstall and find something that actually works! Archos 101IT Internet Tablet w/Android 2.2 Froyo.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great helper app
reviews.comment: This app was awesome to use when I was looking for things on Craigslist. One button to save the posts I liked and an easy UI to come back and sort though all my findings. Lots of potential use for a variety of search and organize websites you are researching
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Capture to cloud rocks
